name: Eggs Benedict Breakfast Pizza
author: LOU SAN ANTONIO
summary: Super easy to make with all the great flavor of Eggs Benedict.  Feed a crowd.
directions: Melt 1 tablespoon butter in a nonstick skillet over medium heat
Pour in eggs, and cook to desired degree of doneness, stirring constantly
Preheat an oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Unroll crescent dough and place rolls on an ungreased 12 inch pizza pan with points toward the center
Press seams together and press up sides of pan to form a crust
Prepare Hollandaise sauce according to package directions using 2/3 cup milk and 1/4 cup butter
Pour evenly over crescent roll crust
Spread scrambled eggs evenly over sauce, then top with cubed ham
Bake in preheated oven until bottom of crust is lightly browned, about 30 minutes
